QuestData.Title: Lofty Goals
QuestData.Description:
Air is a powerful element. It cuts through stone and fills sails to take us where we need to go.
My hypothesis is that air will be the most effective at removing this barrier. It's simple, really.
My scouts report they've found the Orb of Primal Gales. Scout Ri'tal can lead you to it. You can find them near Hornswog Hollow. Quickly!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Scout Ri'tal in Hornswog Hollow.
